name: William Shaver
description: my name is william shaver working in the US Army and i am here for true love. I am a down to earth guy and I’m looking for the same. I like to go out but I also like to stay at home and enjoy a movie together and have that one on one time that is sometimes so hard to find. I’m not really a talker so so be surprised if I am quiet. I am used to being alone but I get lonely a lot of the time. I like working outside and doing things outside as long as the weather is nice. I like cold weather very much I like to swim. Scam pls stay away
